message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses efficient online learning algorithms that avoid projections and use linear optimization steps instead. This is a common topic in the field of machine learning, specifically in the subfield of online learning. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the computational advantages of the proposed algorithms, which suggests that it may also belong to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.IT (Information Theory). Additionally, the paper applies the algorithms to collaborative filtering, which is a common topic in cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
